Translations.Text: Ili don mon charity nur montr while disbelieving DI Last Tag! 1 companion est diabl est mav companion
Why ili ne kred en DI Last Tag don di provisions them? DI est fully aware da them
DI NE inflict ATOM weight injustice. Sur des contrary Li multiplies rekompenc manifold por righteous work grants el Him great recompense
Do when tag judgment ven ni vok witness each community vi (messenger) serv witness these popol
Tag those disbelieved disobeyed messenger wish ili est nivel muel ne single utterance testament ili est able al kasx el DI

O vi kred ne observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) while ebri tial ke vi kon ki vi dir! Nor post sexual orgasm ban unless vi est road vojagx vi est ill vojagx vi hav urinary fecal-related excretion such as gas kontakt women (sexually) vi ne trov akv vi observ Tayammum (sek ablution) per tusx clean sek soil tiam visx your vizagx man therewith! DI est Pardoner Forgiver
Vi not those ricev portion scripture kaj kiel ili choose stray wish vi stray path
